name: Graviball Demo
description:
Warning: Camera movements may be very disorienting!

Play as a ball! Defy gravity! Roll, spin, and platform your way through a handful of levels in this simple game demo.

Controls:

WASD to move. Space to jump. E to stick to platforms.

I would like to add more to this game in my free time, but can't guarantee any updates. But here's a list of things I'd like to add:
Better camera controller. More gravity mechanics/puzzles. Moving/flipping platforms. Buttons/switches. Collectables on each level. Individual level timings.
